message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and unparalleled quality that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an initial offer of $12000 for the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the features you highlighted, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and its unique features, I am willing to negotiate at $11500. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the true value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $11500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10750. This would be a fair price for both of us.
